Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Specimen Container(s): Specimen Lysis Tube containing specimen transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Panther Fusion AdV/hMPV/RV multiplex RT-PCR assay for detection of Adenovirus, human Metapneumovirus, and Rhinovirus in nasopharyngeal swabs using the Panther Fusion system
Indications for Use Summary: A multiplex real-time PCR assay for rapid qualitative detection and differentiation of Adenovirus, human Metapneumovirus, and Rhinovirus nucleic acids from nasopharyngeal swabs to aid differential diagnosis of respiratory tract infections
